item.title: AI Engineer internship
item.description: VanillaHR Internship Experience Link to heading Project Overview Link to heading Duration: 05/13/2024 - 09/30/2024 During my internship at VanillaHR, I was tasked with designing and deploying an innovative CV parsing solution. This project aimed to enhance the recruitment process by employing AI for efficient extraction and analysis of candidate information. Responsibilities and Contribution Link to heading Developed an AI-based CV parsing model to extract relevant information from resumes, ensuring high accuracy and reliability.
